message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $130. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you is $150 and my cost is significantly lower. Let me know if this works for you!

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product to me is $100 and I aim to keep my spending within $150, I would like to propose a price of $110 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your consideration. Based on the value you place on the product and our previous discussion, I would like to propose a price of $120. This allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement while still ensuring a reasonable profit for me. I look forward to your response.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your position and am willing to consider a price closer to your cost. I would like to counter with an offer of $115 for the product.
